inn1.comm: low full toss on the middle and here we go, a boundary to start of proceedings. Gambhir pushed it through to the left of mid-on
swings in to Gambhir who turns it to the square leg
this one again curved in to the batsman on the middle and leg, Gambhir tried to flick it, a tad early into the shot and got a leading edge to the off side
full and outside off, driven to point
Ah! he walks down the track and whips a length delivery through midwicket
wide outside off stump, Gambhir reaches out for it and squeezes it past point
short of length, just outside off stump, Gambhir moves back and across to punch it to point
beaten outside off stump. Off cutter in the zone outside off, Gambhir tries to punch it square but can't get wood on the ball.
on the off and middle, taps it close on the leg side, one look at each other and off they rush for a single
on a length, shapes in to the middle stump line, turned behind square leg
on the leg and middle, flicked to square leg
just outside off stump, tapped to backward point
Sehwag is up and running with a crashing cover drive. Full, width and everything wrong with the ball
closer to the off stump, pushed to the off side
mistimes a punch drive to extra cover for a single
And it just flies over the gully. Fullish, outside off stump, Gambhir walks down the track, goes down on his knee and flashes at a full delivery outside off and it goes just over that very wide slip
leans forward to drive a full length delivery outside off to the cover boundary. Easy pickings here.
Another one that crashes into the cover boundary. The question is will Sehwag get complacent and try hitting every ball.
on the pads and clipped past square leg for couple of runs
angling away from Gambhir who pushes it to covers.
lets that one go through to the 'keeper
Hmm... a tad short and just outside off and Gambhir slaps it past point. Easy as they come
leans forward to push a length delivery to covers
There we go. First six of the game. Short and Sehwag swivels to pull it to deep midwicket boundary and it lands on the ropes.
Sehwag is going at every delivery. This one was biffed back straight and the bowler managed to make a half-stop
cutting away from Gauti who pushes it to covers. The 'keeper is standing up to the stumps
again short and outside off, Gambhir eases it to the cover point boundary and stays there and watches the ball race away to the ropes.
Hmm... short and pulled to midwicket boundary. I fear this is going to be a massacre. Too easy. They bowled pretty well yesterday but have run out of steam today
just outside off, Sehwag is beaten on the cut
short and Sehwag pulls to square leg. He inspects the bottom half of the bat where he made contact with the ball.
leans forward to a fuller delivery on the off stump and steers to backward point
Sehwag pulls a short delivery to midwicket boundary. Up up and over. This is getting all too easy.
Another pull, just a four, though. Small mercies. The stadium is beginning to look like an abattoir.
The slaughter of the lambs continues. He leans forward to a full delivery and swings it over to the cow corner.
Well ... there you go, another boundary. Short again and Gambhir dismisses it to the midwicket boundary
fuller, on a length, on the middle and leg, tucked past square leg
Kruger makes a fine stop at where else but the midwicket boundary to prevent another boundary. Short and pulled.
rotates the strike back to Sehwag after pushing a length delivery to midwicket
Short. swing of the bat. Blur. crashes to wide long-on boundary.
dropped by Munir Dar at covers. Ah the agony. Sehwag crashes a short delivery straight to Munir who clangs it. Sitter. It hit him on his wrists rather than the palms.
around the off stump, defended to the off side.
just outside off stump, cut to point.
nice tight line, on the off stump, pushed back to him. Nadeem is still bowling it slow and giving it some air. Brave fella. Well done sir.
and again, just on the off stump in line, pushed to the cover region
flat and full outside off, Sehwag thrust his front foot across and slog swept it to deep square leg boundary
nice. Rather than fire it in, like many bowlers would have done, Nadeem slowed up the pace further and flighted it outside off, Sehwag is made to wait and taps it  to the off side
leans forward to defend to covers
on the middle and off stump, cut to point
leans forward to push a full delivery to mid-off
backs away a touch to punch a delivery on the stumps to covers
the quick arm ball, Sehwag goes back to push it out to the leg side
slows up the pace, from a round-arm action, lands it on a length and turns it away from the off stump but Sehwag paddles it fine past the short fine-leg fielder who chases gamely but ..
spins in to Gambhir who is cramped but manages to punch it to short extra cover. A fumble there and a single here.
lands this one short and Sehwag opens his stance to carve it to wide midwicket boundary. 50 for Sehwag

threatens to jump out but as the bowler drags back the length a touch, he adjusts to push it to backward point for a quick single. Had it been a direct hit, Sehwag would have been found short of the crease
turns in from short of length, Gambhir goes back to fist it through extra cover. Nice skilful stroke.
comes down the track but the ball dips rapidly on him and he lunges forward to push it out to the off side. Good ball, that.
turns in to Gambhir, full and turned to the on side
moves outside leg stump and slams a full delivery on the off stump to deep cover
turns in to the middle stump, pushed to the off side.
fuller, on the middle and leg, takes out the left leg from the line and drives to long-on
on the off and middle, flat, pushed to the bowler
tossed up on the middle and leg, Sehwag is down the track and blasts it over the bowler's head. Fastest hundred for India in one-day cricket.
Sehwag, wearing a floppy hat, sends this one screaming to the long-on boundary
short and well outside off stump, cut to sweeper cover and Gambhir let out a grunt when he played that shot. He is now holding his right shoulder.
Down on his knee and swings the full delivery on the off stump to deep midwicket
quicker, flatter, on the off stump, pushed to the on side
comes down the track, doesn't get to the pitch of the delivery and chips it towards long-on
Carved to extra cover boundary. Flighted well outside off, Sehwag reached out to slice it over extra cover
dropped by the bowler. Sehwag opened his stance up and punched a short of length delivery hard to the right of Nadeem who dived but couldn't hold on to a tough chance.
You have played the slog sweep, the shot over extra cover, the usual biff over long on and a paddle sweep. What next? A reverse sweep of course. Sehwag sends a full delivery to third man boundary
drives to long-on
turns in from outside off stump, punched to short extra cover
on the leg and middle, turned past square leg
steps down the track, the bowlers shortens the length and its pushes to long-on and they walk across for a single
fuller and driven to long-on for a single
leans forward to push a single to the off side. Sehwag on strike.
slows up the pace, flights it full and Sehwag checks his drive and pats it to the off side
similar delivery and this time Sehwag drives in the air, inside-out, over to the extra-cover region
inside edges a off drive to the leg side
short and well outside off stump, shapes to cut, the bottom-hand comes off the handle, and the ball rolls over to long-off
goes right back to wrist a delivery turning into him to square leg
on the middle stump line, flat and straight, pushed back to the bowler
Relief for Hong Kong. Sehwag is gone. Najeeb strikes. Sehwag rushes down the track and tries to heave it to wide long-on region but edges a dolly to backward point.
quick arm ball on the middle and off, pushed down the track
leans forward to drive a flighted delivery to extra cover
stretches forward to jab a full delivery off the inside edge to the leg side
outside the off stump, cut to backward point
comes down the track, takes it on the full and drives to short midwicket standing pretty straight
turns in from short of length, cut to backward point
just outside off stump, he gets into a position to cut but lets it go in the end
skips down the track and pushes a short of length delivery through midwicket
full and outside off, pushed to extra cover
goes back to wrist a delivery turning in to square leg for a single
on the middle and leg, slight turn, defended down the track
leans forward to push a full delivery to covers
comes down the track, the bowlers keeps it short and Gambhir punches it through covers and that's his fifty.
some turn there, tapped outside off, on the back foot, they think of a single but don't take it
driven firmly down the ground to mid-off
cut to point, straight to the fielder
on the back foot, tapped to the gully region, fielder prowling there but they manage a quick one
slower through the air, pushed to mid-on
nudged to the leg side, they decline a single
rocks back and drives to mid-on, calmly done
faster through the air, moves back and pushes firmly to the cover region
patted to the off side, quicker again
fuller, he's around the wicket and that's driven through extra cover

that's all over for Gambhir, he's danced down the ground but the bowler fired that into the pads, lofted that high towards square leg but that doesn't have the timing, Lamsan comes around and picks off a clean take, that was a soft dismissal and a big boost for Hong Kong
that kept a bit low, Rohit had to wait late for it and push to the off side
slows that one up, patted back to the bowler
83.5kph, driven towards cover, good diving stop by the fielder
off the mark with a scorcher, tossed up outside off, Dhoni lunges and pushes through the covers for four, he's got the gap and the timing is great, all the way for four
big push forward and defended to the off side
well outside off stump, left alone
arm-ball on the middle and leg, jabbed off the inside- edge to pad
short delivery and Dhoni rocks back to force it through extra cover
fuller and it slides past the poke and hits the pad. Going down leg, though.
turning away from the off stump, pushed to long-off
goes back to a full delivery and guides to backward point
appeal for a catch behind as Dhoni is beaten on the forward lunge.
makes room to flat bat a length delivery to long-off
quicker, flatter, on the middle stump, Dhoni leans forward at the last minute to push it back to the bowler.
tossed up outside off, eased to long-off
leans forward to jab a full delivery to the on side
on the off stump line, slight turn and driven to long-off
loopy delivery turning away from Rohit who pushes to extra cover, wants a single but is sent back
goes right back to punch a full delivery to long-off
goes back to push a short of length delivery to the off side
leans forward to defend with the full face of the bat
turns from the middle and leg line, pushed down the track. Good delivery. Loop and spin.
and again. Defended to the off side
fuller, driven to long-on.
leans forward to drive to left of the bowler who makes a diving stop
a flat delivery with the round arm action on the off stump line, punched through the off side
another single down to long-off.
goes back to punch a arm-ball to long-on
on the middle stump, Dhoni was beside the line and stabs it to the off side.
slows up the pace, bit more air and Dhoni is early into the drive and it goes in the air but well to the left of the bowler
turns slowly towards middle and off, Rohit goes back to wrist it to square leg
lunges forward to retain the strike with a push to extra cover
goes back to turn a full delivery behind square leg
on the off stump line, defended to the off side
on the middle and leg line, eased to long-on for a single
on the middle, turning away, tapped to the off side
and again. He is getting some turn and Dhoni is staying beside the line on the leg and middle line and is trying to push it through the off side field

And Rohit is run out. Dhoni was squared up but managed to push it to cover point. For some reason, Rohit had charged across, perhaps he wanted his captain to retain the strike, and couldn't get back in time to beat the direct hit
quicker on the middle stump, pushed back to the bowler
goes back to tap a delivery turning into him to the leg side
slows up the pace, bit more air, Raina goes back to punch it to long-off
leans forward to drive a flighted delivery on the middle and leg to the bowler
a tad short in length, swatted down to long-on in that lovely ugly way that Dhoni plays some times!
retains the strike with a push down to long-on
short delivery, turning in, pushed to long-on
fuller, quicker, on the middle and leg, pushed to the bowler
arm-ball on the legs, dabbed behind square leg
leans forward to push a flighted delivery to long-on
on the middle stump line, tapped to extra cover
leans forward to defend the flighted delivery down the track
leans forward to push to the on side of the track
goes right back to tap a slow delivery to midwicket for a single
slow through the air, on the middle stump line, pushed to the off side for a quick single. The bowler rushed to the ball and fired in a throw at the non-striker's end and misses
leans forward to ease it to long-on
lunges forward to defend
driven back to the bowler
on the middle and leg, turned to deep midwicket for a single
seam-up delivery outside off stump, hit to covers
cuts in a touch, on the middle, forced to long-on
stands tall to punch a length delivery to long-off
short of length, outside off stump, cut hard to point boundary
short in length, just outside off stump, dabbed to point
leans forward to push to the leg side
flighted full, driven back to the bowler
loopy flighted one on the middle and off, again pushed back to the bowler
picks up a single with a drive through the on side
slower through the air, on a length on the middle and off, Dhoni stretches forward, opens the bat face and pushes it to the off side
leans forward to drive to long-off
pushed to midwicket
length delivery on the off stump, punched to long-off
leans forward to punch one through the off side
leans forward to present the full face of the bat to a length delivery on middle and off and picks up a single to long-off
tossed outsdie off, guided to point
on the off stump line, nudged to the midwicket region
tossed full on the middle and leg line and Dhoni drives inside-out to long-off boundary
pushes down to long-off for a single
leans forward to drive through the on side
gentle stuff on the off stump line, pushed to covers
length delivery on the off stump, single down to long-off
cuts in towards the pad, tickled behind square leg
on the off stump line, punched to long-off .
on a length, on the middle and leg, pushed to long-on
pushed to long-off for a single
single through midwicket. They are jogging along here.
goes back to tap a single close on the leg side. No big hits, no risks, just singles
And a boundary now. Full pitched outside off stump, fluent drive through extra cover
skips down the track, takes it on the full but makes contact rather high on the bat and will get a single to long-on
leans forward to push one to covers
lunges out to tap a full delivery back to the bowler
leans forward to push it back to the bowler
short of length delivery on the off stump, stands tall to punch to long-on
on the off stump line, pushed to extra cover
on a length, on the middle and leg, punched to long-on
length delivery on the middle and Raina punches it neatly to wide long-on region
down the leg side. Wide.
on the off stump line, fisted down to long-off.
short of length delivery and Raina has all the time in the world to pull it between midwicket and long-on
rotates the strike with a push to long-off now
Monster hit. Down the track, clean swing of the bat and the white ball kept flying over long-on
and follows it with a single to long-on
goes back to force a slightly short-of-length delivery turning in from outside off to extra cover boundary. The sweeper cover rushed across but made a mess of it in  the end
fuller, on the middle, tapped behind square leg
Another pull. Another boundary. Dhoni has a chat with Raina.
fuller and driven hard but it ricochets off Dhoni's bat as he was trying to ground his bat inside the crease. Both have a smile.
gives Raina the strike back with a dab to right of midwicket
pushes a drive straight to extra cover
sends a length delivery to long-on
slow off cutter, driven back to the bowler
a push through the on side field and another single results
tapped to cover point for another single.
leans across to wrist a flighted delivery on the middle to short fine-leg region
slow through the air, Dhoni is made to wait and taps it to the on side
arm-ball, coming in towards middle and leg, Dhoni backs away to push it through to long-on
on a length, on the middle and off, mistimes a punch back to the bowler
short of length, on the off and middle, punched hard but straight back at the bowler
on the middle and leg, full in length, turned to midwicket region for a single
leans forward to push a full delivery to long-on
on the middle and leg, dabbed to the on side
stands tall to punch a length delivery to long-off. They are delaying the final onslaught.
on the pads and it bounds away to short fine-leg region. Drinks break now.
loopy delivery on middle and leg, pushed through square leg
driven to long-off
driven to cover point
on the middle and leg and turned to backward square leg and that's his fifty
pushed back to the bowler
leans forward to dead-bat a delivery on the off stump line
pushed through the off side field
After Raina, Dhoni brings up his fifty with a punch-drive to long-off
cleared his front leg and swung a slow off cutter over wide long-on
fuller, driven to long-on
really full in length, dug out to the off side
almost on the yorker length, Dhoni inside edges a drive behind square leg
wide outside off stump, Dhoni reaches out and drives to extra cover
Another big hit. Lands again on the roof. He went down the track, got under the ball and heaved it over long-on
full delivery, biffed to wide long-on region. Didn't quite time it well

Almost stumped. Nadeem saw him coming down the track, dragged back the length and turned it away from Dhoni was beaten but managed to drag the bat back in the crease. He had tried to jam the bat down on the ball, missed but by that act, had got the bat close to the crease and just kept dragging it inside the crease. If he had gone for a lofted shot or a cut, he would not have got time to get the back in time
No mistake this time. He stayed inside the crease and unfurled an inside-out lofted drive over wide long-off.
Raina joins in the mayhem. He took out the front leg out of the line and swung a full delivery over long-on.
fuller and Raina couldn't get his bat under the ball but drilled it through wide long-on
Right in the slot. The bat comes down in tremendous speed. Blur. Blink. The ball has sailed well over long-on. Huge hit.
well outside the off stump, Raina tries to slog it to the on side, misses and so does the 'keeper
Another one in the slot and Raina sends it disappearing over long-on. What a carnage.
slower one, Raina retains the strike with a push to sweeper cover
moves outside leg, a slower one arrives and its chipped to left of long-off
walks down the track to on drive a length delivery for a single. Over to Dhoni.
fullish, on the middle, driven to long-off for a single
down the track and attempts to heave to wide long-on but the execution doesn't match the intent. The ball flies off the outer edge to third man
change of pace, slower and short in length outside off, Dhoni swats it to deep midwicket
another attempted heave, another edge but this time profitable. The ball goes to the deep cover point boundary
yorker length on the middle, jabbed back to the bowler
way outside off stump. Even the bowler would have been surprised had that not been called a wide.
really full, almost at the blockhole, stabbed towards long-on
fullpitched, driven hard back down the track and the bowler makes a half-stop and the ball rolls through midwicket region
lovely extra cover drive. He moved outside leg stump and chipped a full pitched delivery inside-out over the off side field.
Hundred with a six. Dhoni hugs him. His team-mates are up on their feet. He smashed a slower one outside leg over long leg.
full one outside off stump and Raina lets it go through to the 'keeper
And Dhoni goes down town. He cleared his front leg and used the bottom-hand to  power a lofted shot straight over the bowler.
single to long-on
Raina charged down the track and wanted to heave it to wide long-on but edged it to over extra cover. Good catch by Irfan running back
on a length, on the middle, pushed to covers
shuffles across to drive a full delivery to long-on
low full toss on the middle, hands over the strike to Dhoni with a push to long-on
beaten outside off stump. It cut away off a length and Dhoni followed the movement and tried to run it down to third man but ...
Brutal bottom-hand powered flat six. Again, the front leg was cleared and the bat came down in a hurry to loft the full delivery over long-on
fullish, driven to long-off for a single
gets forward to drive a length delivery to long-on
almost at the blockhole, punched to sweeper cover
slower one, off a length, on the middle and off, Dhoni is surprised by the change of pace but decides to punch it through the on side and edges it through the vacant slip region
down the track and drives to wide long-off
Crashes into the roof. Couple of steps down the track and manages to work his bottom-hand over time to get under the full delivery to send it over long-on.
slower one, pushes a single to extra cover
full and hint of away movement, tapped to wide third man for couple of runs
length delivery on the middle stump line and Robin chips it over midwicket with a flick of the wrist
full pitched, turned through the on side
walks across the stumps to work a full delivery on the middle and off to deep square leg
leans forward to push a length delivery to mid-off region
yorker length on the off stump, pushed towards mid-off for a single
lunges forward to get the yorker on the full and drives down the ground. Uthappa turns quickly for the second run and Dhoni will get his hundred.  Two tons in this game.
swing a full pitched delivery to wide midwicket.
swing and a miss. He charged down and had a almighty swing at it. And now sports a big smile.
again comes down the track but Haider bangs it short and the ball flies over the blade. Good stuff from Haider.
Fuller outside off stump, Dhoni tries to swing it over midwicket but edges it towards third man
slower one, low full toss on the middle stump, Dhoni waits for the ball to arrive before spanking it to deep backward square leg.
pulls a length delivery to deep midwicket. Last ball coming up.
Uthappa walks down the track, as he often does in these situations, and swings a length delivery over wide long-on.

inn2.comm: in the zone outside off, rushing through the line, left alone
big inswing but down the leg side. Wide called. If he gets the line right, it should get interesting. he can move it both ways
And this one swings away from the right hander, left alone
on the middle and off, defended to the off side
just outside the off stump, jabbed to the off side
swings well down the leg side.
on the middle and leg line, flicked past square leg
outswinger to end the over. Left alone
around the off stump, dabbed to third man
comes in off a good length, he thinks it will go away but it comes in a touch and strikes him rather high on the pad
Dead plumb. It curves in to the middle stump line and the batsman can't get his bat around the front pad in time.
huge shout for lbw as this one too curves in. Looked pretty close. It would have taken out leg.
just outside off stump, holding its line, pushes inside the line and is beaten
another shout for lbw but this one would have missed leg. Again swinging into the right-hand batsman. They are pressing the front leg too much across and are having to play around the front pad
well down the leg side and Dhoni gathers.
on a length, around the middle and off stump line, jabbed off the inside edge to square leg
moves away from the middle and off line and Atkinson has a flirt outside off
around that off stump, squeezed to point
inswinger from just outside off stump, pushed back to the bowler
lovely delivery that straightens after landing on the same spot as the last ball and Atkinson, though beaten, does well not to chase it. He just pushed down the line
short of length, moving away, pushed to cover point for a single
nice looking off drive brings up the first boundary. He leaned into the shot and presented the full face of the blade to a full delivery on the off stump line
banged in short of length, on the leg and middle, tucked behind square leg
short of length, moving away, steered to backward point
full and outside off, no foot movement but he tries to flash it through the off side but makes no contact
Two slips and the leg slip watch as Dar is beaten outside off again
nips back in from the middle stump line, stabs it off the inside edge to long leg
on the middle stump line, tapped close on the leg side towards midwicket for a quick single
short of length, just outside off stump, pushed to covers
bangs in a bouncer and Dar, who was hit on the grill yesterday, manages to sway away in time
down the leg side this time
just outside off stump, moving away slightly, defended to covers
short of length delivery moving away from Dar who slashes it to third man
stands tall to punch a short-of-length delivery to point
hits the deck short of length, slants it away from Dar who gets on top of the bounce nicely to punch it through cover point
even better shot. He arched back to create more room and punched the delivery angling away from him past the diving point fielder.
fuller and Dar stays rooted to the crease, has a flash and is beaten.
cuts it away from Dar who tries to run it down to third man but can't get wood on leather
coming in from a good length, pushed to covers
fuller and well outside off stump, Dar has another swing and a miss
And is hit for a boundary of his first delivery in ODI cricket. Short of length and just outside off, Atkinson stood tall to punch it through cover point
on the middle stump line, on a length, pushed down the track
beaten. It landed on a length around off and shaped away, Atkinson tried to drive on the up
fuller, just outside off stump, pushed to left of mid-on
full pitched outside off stump, driven to left of covers where Raina makes a diving stop
leans forward to push a length delivery to covers
gets forward and forces a length delivery on the up in front of covers. Good shot that
holds its line on middle and off, defended to the off side
dabbed to third man for a single
Atkinson ducks under a bouncer before smiling at the bowler
length delivery, slanting across Atkinson who squeezes it to third man
spears it in from round the stumps, defended
back of length, on the off stump line, pushed to mid-on
bangs it short and keeps it in the outside-off zone, Atkinson withdraws his bat from the line
fuller, around the off stump line, driven to covers
full, outside off stump, Dar attempts a cover drive but can't connect
on the off stump line, goes on straight, pushed to the off side
banged in short, it cut in a touch, Dar took his eyes off the ball and ball rushed through to Dhoni who appeals. He reckons it went of the gloves and he is right. It did go off the gloves.
drives a length delivery on the up in the air past the diving short cover fielder
short of length, lapped over square leg
around the off stump, driven to Raina at covers
another short-of- length delivery punched through covers
down the leg side, another wide from Praveen
leans forward to push a length delivery to covers
short of length, on the off stump, pushed to the off side
short of length, on the off and middle, worked past square leg
short of length, pulled to long leg
lands it on a length, on the middle, pushed to the off side
short of length, holds its line outside off, run down to third man
full one, just short of the blockhole, dug out to the off side
on the off stump line, driven to mid-off
stands tall to punch a length delivery to Raina at covers
swings away and Atkinson tries to drive on the up again and misses
Crash! Full in length and outside off, Atkinson creamed it on the up through extra covers
the slow bouncer and the young Atkinson lets it go through to Dhoni
full and outside off, he goes for the big drive but doesn't connect
driven to cover point where its fielded by Pravin
flighted full on the middle, pushed to extra cover

stumped by a lovely leg break. He ran down the track, the ball dipped in front of him on the middle stump line and turned past the outside edge. Chawla was guilty in his earlier days of bowling too many googlies and not concentrating enough on the conventional one but he is making amends these days. A session with Warne recently has helped.
on a length, on off, batsman stretches forwards and jabs it to leg for a single
good delivery, length, a bit of width, driven to mid-off
pitched on middle and turned away, got a leading edge which landed safely behind square on the off
back of a length, sliding towards leg, Butt tries to turn it towards midwicket but gets an inside edge
outside off and pushed towards cover
on a length, in the channel, batsman watches it sail through to the keeper
good length again, this time on middle, batsman leans forwards and defends it back down the pitch
a touch shorter this time, a nagging line just outside off, defended awkwardly
misses the maiden with a wild, short delivery down the leg side
slower delivery, on middle and leg, Butt gets forward and strokes it towards mid-on
well flighted, but outside leg, Butt gets another single to midwicket
shortish, just outside off, cannons off bottom edge but no danger
pushed to cover
wrong 'un, batsmen gets a big stride in, hits the pad, but that pitched outside off
outside off and that was left alone
defended back to the bowler
good length, a bit of width, Atkinson goes after that but fails to make contact
Atkinson's beaten this time, a tight line, back of a length and he gets good lift off the pitch
wide outside off, Atkinson lets that one go
closer to off this time but Atkinson doesn't attempt a stroke this time either
overpitched, just outside off, punched to extra cover
short of length, on off, pushed off the backfoot towards cover but can't beat the field
spins away from the batsman
stumped by a googly this time. He charged down the track, had a big heave, missed but Dhoni didn't
turning past the off stump, left alone
shout for lbw as a googly strikes the pad in front of middle and it would have hit the leg stump
leans forward to drive to the off side
goes back to punch a delivery back down the track
short of length, outside off, punched to extra cover
turns in towards middle and off, defended to covers
soft dismissal. He couldn't keep a straight drive down. The ball dipped on him and he didn't quite lean forward into the shot.
turns in to the pads, worked behind square leg
spins in towards middle and off, pushed to the off side
fuller, just outside off stump, defended on the front foot
googly from outside off stump, stretches across to defend and is hit on the pad well outside off
another googly, jabbed to the off side
the conventional leg break and he is beaten on the drive
another one spinning away, thinks about offering a stroke and kills that thought in the end.
leans forward to defend to the off side
leg break on the middle, turned to the on side
turns in from the off stump line, defended bat and pad to the leg side
goes right back to turn a delivery turning in to square leg
on the back foot and pushes it to covers
leans forward, tries to play with the turn, misses and it bounds ff the pad to the off side
makes contact this time and pushes it to midwicket
slog sweeps a delivery from well outside the off stump to deep midwicket boundary
beaten by the leg break. He is unsure and has a rather tentative poke
fuller, sliding in and it hits him on the pad but going down leg
googly now and he goes back to push it back to the bowler
topspinner just outside off stump, is late on the defensive poke, bat comes outside the line and inside-edges to square leg
flighted leg break around the off and middle line and is lofted rather nicely inside-out over extra cover
shortens the length, the slider skids on to the off stump, he shapes to cut, realises the ball is rushing through and gets his bat down quickly to chop it to point
leans forward to push a delivery to Gambhir at covers
leans forward to tap a flighted delivery close on the off side
steps down the track, Yusuf drags back the length a touch and its squeezed behind square leg
on the off and middle, defended to the on side
stretches forward to play a compact defensive stroke
quicker one but slips it down leg
tosses this one full, driven back to the bowler
another stumping. This time by a big spinning leg break. It drifted in towards leg stump before turning sharply past the lunging batsman. Dhoni does the final rites.
comes in a touch, jabbed bat and pad to the off side
on the middle stump, turns away and runs off the outer edge to the off side
almost caught at gully. He went back to push hard a delivery turning away and edged it just to the left of Robin Uthappa. Now another fielder goes to the right of Robin.
full one, jabbed back down the track
pushed to covers
leans forward to push it back down the track
comes down the track and lofts a flighted delivery to long-on boundary. There was a fielder half-way between mid-on and long-on but he cleared him
on the middle, turned to the leg side
doesn't connect properly with the sweep and the ball rolls away to the on side
full outside off, pushed to the off side
on the middle and leg, turned to the leg side
drifts in on to the middle and leg line, pushed down the track
drift and turn, past the defensive poke and just missing the off stump
low full toss outside off stump and driven through cover point
on the middle stump, going on straight, squeezed past gully
turns from short of length, from leg to off, defended to the off side
slider on the leg and middle, hits him on the pad, going down leg, though
leans forward to drive to covers
turns in from outside off, a touch short in length and that allows him to work it to the midwicket region
goes right back to work it to midwicket
plants his front leg across and sweeps the ball from outside off to deep square leg boundary
on the off and middle line, turned to square leg
quicker one, appeal for a catch down leg by Dhoni but it brushed the pads
leans forward to defend to the off side
the top spinner, full on the middle, turned past square leg
lands on the middle and off and spins away sharply
turning away but short of length and is cut to backward point
gets forward to drive to mid-off
floated on the off stump line, worked to deep midwicket
turns in from a length, a touch late in getting forward but lunges at the last minute to defend to the on side
turns this one to square leg
from wide of the crease, spins from the stumps to the leg side
leans forward to defend a delivery turning into middle stump
wristed to  square leg
comes down the track, can't reach the pitch of a dipping delivery but manages to push it to the off side
gets forward to jab a delivery on the middle and off line
leans forward to take a delivery sliding on the middle and leg line on the pad
tossed on the leg stump, swept away to Goni at long leg and Dhoni screams, "Ghoomega" (that ball will spin) and Goni makes the stop
beaten by a lovely leg break. It drifted in towards leg stump, dipped and spun sharply across the poke
the googly this time but down on the middle and leg line
spinning to middle and leg line, runs off the pad to fine leg
outside the off stump, not much turn, steered to backward point

Irfan is run out.  Yusuf floated it outside off stump, Irfan turned to right of square leg where RP rushed to and fired a throw to Yusuf who collected the ball awkwardly in front of the stumps but managed to break the stumps
lands it full outside off, turns in, jabbed to silly point
dropped by RP. Too late in getting down. It came off the edge from an intended defensive poke and went right between his legs.
leans forward to defend
turning away from short of length, beaten on the cut
full, on the middle, clears the front leg, slog sweeps but mistimes it to midwicket
again the front leg is taken away from the line and he crashes a full delivery along the ground and right between Chawla's legs

Wicket no 7. He top edges a slog sweep to mid-on. Another wicket for Chawla who has bowled quite a few legbreaks in this game and has got them to turn. The right arm used to go too high and in an angle, almost touching the right ear and he used to bowl lots of googlies but was unable to get the leg break to turn much. Now he has corrected his right-arm position, at times he even gets them rounder to impart more turn.
on the off stump line, googly to the left-hander, dabbed to gully
from round the stumps, beats the forward prod and hits him on the pad.
leans forward to drive a flighted delivery to covers
another flighted one outside off stump, chips it just over mid-off running back
stretches forward to defend
slows up the pace and he edges an intended off drive to midwicket
flatter, pushed to the off side
from round the stumps this time, gets it to turn towards off stump, pushed back to the bowler
floated on the off stump from round the stumps, pushed to the off side
a touch short and cut to point
driven to extra cover
on the legs, swept to fine leg for a boundary.
gets forward to defend a delivery on the off stump
RP misses another one in the slips. TOugher chance this time. He is again standing up too erect and doesn't get down in time. In fact doesn't even get hands to a delivery dipping away to his right
driven uppishly to midwicket but falls short
another run out. Pushed to backward point and only Lamsam ran and he had to run back. Too late.
on the off and middle, dabbed to silly point
slows up the pace, tosses it outside off, left alone
tossed on the middle and leg, driven to mid-on
on the leg and middle, swept to deep square leg
just outside off stump, guided to backward point
floated on the off, defended off the front foot
fuller and pushed to covers
turning in to the middle stump, jabbed to the leg side
leans forward to defend a delivery on middle and leg line
beaten on the flirt outside off
a tad quicker, on the middle stump, defended down the track
on the leg stump line, defended back to the bowler
short and wide, cut hard to deep point boundary
turning away and cut through backward point
flighted outside off, driven to mid-off

huge shout for lbw but not given. The front leg was pressed across and he couldn't get back his bat around it in time. It hit him in front of middle and leg, umpire reckons it would have gone down leg
does it on his own with a yorker. Really full on the middle stump and he played all around it
Caught by Dhoni. It held its line after landing around the off stump line, he got a thin nick to defensive poke. Game over.
